page.title: 15STEETON TRAFFIC CENSUS:1
page.content: {Steeton}village is divided into two by a busy main road,the Skipton to Bradford{A65.}There are plans to build a new road,the Aire Valley Trunk road which will take all but local traffic away from Steeton. Steeton Primary School carried out a traffic census to see if this new road is needed. During 1 day in June 1985 we did 4, ten minutes counts of traffic in each direction.We recorded the number of cars,heavy goods vehicles (H.G.V.) vans,public service vehicles and bikes. Over the total time of 40 minutes we counted 939 cars,198 H.G.V.202 vans, 34 bikes and 27 public service vehicles,(all with internal combustion engines).A total of 1380 vehicles in all.
